newsitem.title: USA: Warm weather holding in Brazil coffee belt - WSC.
newsitem.headline: Warm weather holding in Brazil coffee belt - WSC.

text.p: Cold air building in Argentina is expected to bypass Brazil's coffee belt over the weekend as the warm ridge of high pressure dominating the area continues its stay, Weather Services Corp said in an update on Wednesday.
A few light showers were reported in the coffee belt this morning. Low temperatures ranged from 54-61 F (12-16 C).

Fair to partly cloudy skies are expected in all areas of the region today. There is a chance of showers developing on Thursday. Low temperatures should remain near to above normal levels with lows in the 50's to low 60's F (low to middle teens C).
Fair to partly cloudy skies are expected for the early part of next week. Temperatures should remain near normal with no damaging cold expected, according to WSC.
